item.title: The Lions and Falcons Just Set a Record with an 8 and a Half Minute Play. It’s a Beautiful Lesson in Humanity
item.description: After Lions’ player, Morice Norris, was injured during the fourth quarter, the teams showed us what really matters.

item.title: The 6-Hour RV Trip That Made Me a Better Founder
item.description: That weekend taught me more about leadership, patience, and presence than any conference ever could.

item.title: This Analyst Says Tesla’s Humanoid Robots Could Lead a Workplace Revolution
item.description: Hands-on manufacturing jobs could be a thing of the past if the technology is successful at lowering hourly costs.

item.title: Should You Fight a Bad Review or Invest in Your Brand?
item.description: This is the $1,500 question one med spa owner faced after a scathing one-star review.

item.title: Welcome to the Weird New Empty World of LinkedIn
item.description: Just when exactly did the world’s largest business platform turn into an endless feed of AI-generated slop?
